name: 葛瑞斐
objective: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。Through class discussion and group presentations, this course will help develop students’ English conversation skills.
schedule:
1:  Introduction
2-5: Personal Narrative: A Story of Anger, Jealousy, or Fear
6-8: Super powers: If I could . . . I would
9:    MIDTERM
10-12:  News Story: Q&A
13-15: Photographs
16-17:  Film and discussion
18:      FINAL
scorePolicy:
Midterm  33.3%
Final  33.3%
Participation  33.3%

Grading for midterm and final projects on will be based on criteria such as clarity, fluency, originality, and effort.



Attendance:   a combination of 4 absences or late days =  -10 points from course grade
